description: Monitor executed commands and arguments for actions that could be taken to clear command history, such as Clear-History on Windows or `clear logging` / `clear history` via a Network Device CLI in AAA logs, or to disable writing command history, such as history -c in bash/zsh . Analytic 1 - Powershell Commands (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Powershell/Operational" EventCode="4103") (CommandLine="*Clear-History*" OR (CommandLine="*Remove-Item*" AND CommandLine="*ConsoleHost_history.text*"))
